mapper.insert: insert into TBL_BO_EMPLOYEES(EMPLOYEENO, id, passwd, name, jubun, email, emailpw, phone, registerday, status, fk_positionno, fk_departmentno) values(SEQ_BO_EMPLOYEES.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{jubun}, #{email}, #{emailpw}, #{phone}, default, 1, #{fk_positionno}, #{fk_departmentno})
